caption.p: Recovery time of centromeric Scm3-tdEos after targeted photobleaching

fn.p: Note: After targeted photobleaching of photoconverted Scm3-tdEos centromere clusters with 551 nm dye-laser, cells were imaged with stepwise focus changes within -1 μm to +1 μm Z range (7 steps, 333nm apart, 5 sec. exposure per step). G2 clusters were excluded due to their extended size.
